question_categories.question: Which phase are you interested in?

options.optionText: Phase 1 (highest risk): These trials focus on assessing the safety of a new treatment.
Phase 2 (moderate risk): These trials evaluate the effectiveness of the treatment.
Phase 3 (lower risk): These trials compare the new treatment to the current standard.
Phase 4 (lowest risk): These trials occur after the treatment has been approved.
Trials where phase is listed as N/A.
